Speeds.string: 30 ft. (60 ft. with boots of speed)

MonsterTrait.Name: Insanity
MonsterTrait.Text: Droki has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
Droki's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: minor illusion 1/day each: darkness, fear, shatter

MonsterTrait.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: Droki deals an extra 7 (2d6) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage ont he attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Droki that isn't incapacitated and Droki doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Resistance
MonsterTrait.Text: The derro has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the derro has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: Droki makes two attacks with his shortsword

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit:6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage. The sword is coated with serpent venom that wears off after the first hit. A target subjected to the venom must make a DC 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: Droki adds 3 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Droki must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
